name: mvrraddi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqtri(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2)
-| wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1))
-| wceq(co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2)
-| wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1))
-| wceq(co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c2)

stmt.origin: oveq1i(c0, cmin, c1, co(c2, caddc, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1))
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2)
-| wceq(co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c2)
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c2)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2)
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1))
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

comment: Move RHS right addition to LHS. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Oct-2018.)
